Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The connecting bridge ahead is the only route connecting this sector to the next.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The Core Area is on the other side of the bridge. It's highly likely that Huaxu is stored there.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But the blockade... Seems like the front end of the bridge is blocked.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it possible to unlock the blockade command?', 3: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The mechanism of this blockade seems to be the same as the other ones we've seen before. I can give it a try.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The bearings also seem to be breakable.', 4: '2'}
